AssociateAwsAccountWithPartnerAccount.name: AssociateAwsAccountWithPartnerAccount
AssociateAwsAccountWithPartnerAccount.description: Grants permission to link partner accounts with Aws account

AssociateWirelessDeviceWithThing.name: AssociateWirelessDeviceWithThing
AssociateWirelessDeviceWithThing.description:
Grants permission to associate the wireless device with AWS IoT thing for a given
                                                wirelessDeviceId

AssociateWirelessGatewayWithCertificate.name: AssociateWirelessGatewayWithCertificate
AssociateWirelessGatewayWithCertificate.description: Grants permission to associate a WirelessGateway with the IoT Core Identity certificate

AssociateWirelessGatewayWithThing.name: AssociateWirelessGatewayWithThing
AssociateWirelessGatewayWithThing.description:
Grants permission to associate the wireless gateway with AWS IoT thing for a given
                                                wirelessGatewayId

CreateWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.name: CreateWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition
CreateWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a WirelessGateway task definition

DeleteWirelessGateway.description: Grants permission to delete a WirelessGateway

DeleteWirelessGatewayTask.description: Grants permission to delete task for a given WirelessGateway

DeleteWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.name: DeleteWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition
DeleteWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a WirelessGateway task definition

DisassociateAwsAccountFromPartnerAccount.description: Grants permission to disassociate an AWS account from a partner account

DisassociateWirelessDeviceFromThing.description: Grants permission to disassociate a wireless device from a AWS IoT thing

DisassociateWirelessGatewayFromCertifica.description: Grants permission to disassociate a WirelessGateway from a IoT Core Identity certificate

GetDeviceProfile.description: Grants permission to get the DeviceProfile

GetLogLevelsByResourceTypes.description: Grants permission to get log levels by resource types

GetPartnerAccount.name: GetPartnerAccount
GetPartnerAccount.description: Grants permission to get the associated PartnerAccount

GetResourceLogLevel.name: GetResourceLogLevel
GetResourceLogLevel.description: Grants permission to get resource log level

GetServiceEndpoint.name: GetServiceEndpoint
GetServiceEndpoint.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the customer account specific endpoint for CUPS protocol
                                                connection or LoRaWAN Network Server (LNS) protocol connection, and optionally server
                                                trust certificate in PEM format

GetServiceProfile.name: GetServiceProfile
GetServiceProfile.description: Grants permission to get the ServiceProfile

GetWirelessDevice.name: GetWirelessDevice
GetWirelessDevice.description: Grants permission to get the WirelessDevice

GetWirelessDeviceStatistics.description: Grants permission to get statistics info for a given WirelessDevice

GetWirelessGateway.name: GetWirelessGateway
GetWirelessGateway.description: Grants permission to get the WirelessGateway

GetWirelessGatewayCertificate.description:
Grants permission to get the IoT Core Identity certificate id associated with the
                                                WirelessGateway

GetWirelessGatewayFirmwareInformation.name: GetWirelessGatewayFirmwareInformation
GetWirelessGatewayFirmwareInformation.description: Grants permission to get Current firmware version and other information for the WirelessGateway

GetWirelessGatewayStatistics.name: GetWirelessGatewayStatistics
GetWirelessGatewayStatistics.description: Grants permission to get statistics info for a given WirelessGateway

GetWirelessGatewayTask.name: GetWirelessGatewayTask
GetWirelessGatewayTask.description: Grants permission to get the task for a given WirelessGateway

GetWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.name: GetWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition
GetWirelessGatewayTaskDefinition.description: Grants permission to get the given WirelessGateway task definition

ListDestinations.description: List information of available Destinations based on the AWS account.

Grants permission to list information of available DeviceProfiles based on the AWS
                                                account

ListPartnerAccounts.description: Grants permission to list the available partner accounts

ListServiceProfiles.name: ListServiceProfiles

Grants permission to list information of available ServiceProfiles based on the AWS
                                                account

Grants permission to list information of available WirelessDevices based on the AWS
                                                account

Grants permission to simulate a provisioned device to send an uplink data with payload
                                                of 'Hello'
